Name: sea-booking-order-editor
Label: Sea Booking Order Editor

Components.Label: Shipper
Consignee
Customer
Incoterm
Unit
Commodity
Shipment type
Sale man
HBL Type
Service mode
Print BK 2
Components.Query:
SELECT 
CUS.Name AS CUSNAME,
BK.ShipperText AS SHIPPERINFOR,

FORMAT(BK.PlaceStuffingDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS STUFFINGDATE,
STUFFING.Name AS PLACEOFSTUFFING,
BK.ContactStuffing AS Contact,
FORMAT(bk.VgmCutOffDate, 'dd MMM, yy hh:mm') AS Closingtime,
bk.FeederVessel AS FeederVesselN, 
bk.FeederVoy AS FeederVoyN,
FORMAT(BK.EtdDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETD,
FORMAT(BK.EtaDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETA,
POL.Name AS POLNAME,
POD.Name AS PODNAME,
ISNULL((SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(ROUND(inc.Quantity, 0), ' x ', cont.Name ), ' & ') AS Containers
     FROM EntityContainer inc
     LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON inc.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
     WHERE inc.EntityId = '{Id}'),'') AS ContainersQty,
BK.Quantity AS Qty,
Unit.Name AS UnitPKG,
BK.GW AS GWIF,
dropofat.Name droof,
pickup.Name pkat,
BK.CBM AS CBMIF,
COMMO.Name AS COMMO,
BK.SpecialRequest AS SPREQUEST, 
ISNULL(HBLType.Name,'') AS HBLType,
isnull(Inco.Name,'') AS Inco,
HBLType.Name AS HBLType,
cre.NickName AS Creater
FROM dbo.Booking BK
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner CUS ON CUS.Id = BK.CustomerId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal STUFFING ON STUFFING.Id = BK.PlaceStuffingId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = BK.PolId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = BK.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pickup ON pickup.Id = BK.PickupId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal dropofat ON dropofat.Id = BK.DropOffId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Unit ON Unit.Id = BK.UnitId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData COMMO ON COMMO.Id = BK.CommodityId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal Deli ON Deli.Id = BK.DeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Inco ON Inco.Id = BK.IncotermId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData HBLType ON HBLType.Id = BK.HblTypeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] cre ON cre.Id =  '{TokenUserId}'
WHERE 
BK.Id='{Id}'

Components.Label: Print BK
Components.Query:
SELECT 
CUS.Name AS CUSNAME,
CUS.PhoneNumber AS PhoneNumber,
BK.ShipperText AS SHIPPERINFOR,
FORMAT(BK.BookingDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS BKDATE,
BK.ConsigneeText AS CONSIGNEEINFOR,
FORMAT(BK.PlaceStuffingDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS STUFFINGDATE,
STUFFING.Name AS PLACEOFSTUFFING,
BK.ContactStuffing AS Contact,
FORMAT(bk.VgmCutOffDate, 'dd MMM, yy hh:mm') AS Closingtime,
bk.FeederVessel AS FeederVesselN, 
bk.FeederVoy AS FeederVoyN,
FORMAT(BK.EtdDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETD,
FORMAT(BK.EtaDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETA,
POL.Name AS POLNAME,
POD.Name AS PODNAME,
(SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(ROUND(inc.Quantity, 0), ' x ', cont.Name ), ' & ') AS Containers
     FROM EntityContainer inc
     LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON inc.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
     WHERE inc.EntityId = '{Id}') AS ContainersQty,
BK.Quantity AS Qty,
Unit.Name AS UnitPKG,
BK.GW AS GWIF,
BK.CBM AS CBMIF,
COMMO.Name AS COMMO,
BK.SpecialRequest AS SPREQUEST, 
Inco.Name AS IncotermN,
HBLType.Name AS HBLType,
cre.NickName AS Creater
FROM dbo.Booking BK
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner CUS ON CUS.Id = BK.CustomerId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal STUFFING ON STUFFING.Id = BK.PlaceStuffingId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = BK.PolId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = BK.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Unit ON Unit.Id = BK.UnitId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData COMMO ON COMMO.Id = BK.CommodityId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal Deli ON Deli.Id = BK.DeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Inco ON Inco.Id = BK.IncotermId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData HBLType ON HBLType.Id = BK.HblTypeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] cre ON cre.Id =  '{TokenUserId}'
WHERE 
BK.Id='{Id}'

Components.Label: Pritest
Components.Query:
SELECT 
CUS.Name AS CUSNAME,
BK.ShipperText AS SHIPPERINFOR,

FORMAT(BK.PlaceStuffingDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS STUFFINGDATE,
STUFFING.Name AS PLACEOFSTUFFING,
BK.ContactStuffing AS Contact,
FORMAT(bk.VgmCutOffDate, 'dd MMM, yy hh:mm') AS Closingtime,


FORMAT(BK.EtdDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETD,
FORMAT(BK.EtaDate,'dd MMM, yy') AS ETA,
POL.Name AS POLNAME,
POD.Name AS PODNAME,
ISNULL((SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(ROUND(inc.Quantity, 0), ' x ', cont.Name ), ' & ') AS Containers
     FROM dbo.EntityContainer inc
     LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON inc.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
     WHERE inc.Id = '{Id}'),'') AS ContainersQty,
BK.Quantity AS Qty,
Unit.Name AS UnitPKG,
BK.GW AS GWIF,
BK.CBM AS CBMIF,
COMMO.Name AS COMMO,
BK.SpecialRequest AS SPREQUEST, 
ISNULL(HBLType.Name,'') AS HBLType,
isnull(Inco.Name,'') AS Inco,
HBLType.Name AS HBLType,
cre.NickName AS Creater
FROM dbo.Booking BK
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner CUS ON CUS.Id = BK.CustomerId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal STUFFING ON STUFFING.Id = BK.PlaceStuffingId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = BK.PolId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = BK.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Unit ON Unit.Id = BK.UnitId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData COMMO ON COMMO.Id = BK.CommodityId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal Deli ON Deli.Id = BK.DeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData Inco ON Inco.Id = BK.IncotermId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData HBLType ON HBLType.Id = BK.HblTypeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] cre ON cre.Id =  '{TokenUserId}'
WHERE 
BK.Id='{Id}'
